type.description: Type of slave. If redirect, the slave will redirect to the given url. If zope, the rewrite rules will be compatible with Virtual Host Monster.
type.title: Backend Type

custom_domain.description: Custom Domain to use for the website
custom_domain.title: Custom Domain

server-alias.description: Server Alias List separated by space
server-alias.title: Server Alias

default-path.description: Provide default path to redirect user to when user access / (the site root)
default-path.title: type:zope Default Path

disable-no-cache-request.description: If set to true, Cache-Control and Pragma requests headers will not be sent to cache and backend servers. This prevents clients from bypassing cache when enable_cache is true
disable-no-cache-request.title: enable_cache: Disable 'no-cache' requests

disable-via-header.description: If set to true, Via response headers will not be sent to client
disable-via-header.title: enable_cache: Disable 'Via' headers from cache

disabled-cookie-list.description: List of Cookies separated by space that will not be sent to cache and backend servers. This is especially useful to discard analytics tracking cookies when using Vary: Cookie cache headers
disabled-cookie-list.title: Disabled Cookies

enable_cache.description: If set to true, http caching server (Apache Traffic Server) will be used between frontend Caddy and backend
enable_cache.title: Enable Cache

https-only.description: If set to true, http requests will be redirected to https
https-only.title: HTTPS Only

path.description: Path to proxy to in the backend
path.title: type:zope Backend Path

prefer-gzip-encoding-to-backend.description: If set to true, frontend will rewrite Accept-Encoding request header to simply 'gzip' for all variants of Accept-Encoding containing 'gzip', in order to maximize cache hits for resources cached with Vary: Accept-Encoding when enable_cache is used
prefer-gzip-encoding-to-backend.title: Prefer gzip Encoding for Backend
